overview: The film sees a woman visit a hypnotist to address an unwanted addiction. As part of her cure, objects, people and images are transformed through hypnosis; pain is bought to the surface and removed through analgesia. The title refers to the artist Dora Maar, Picassoâ€™s lover and muse, who after the break-up of their affair, declared: "After Picasso, only God."
title: After Picasso, God
